args: Is this article primarily about a new action or announcement by the Trump administration/White House/Executive? Respond simply with "yes" or "no" . President Donald Trump signed an executive order on Monday requiring the federal government to return to... President Donald Trump signed an executive order on Monday requiring the federal government to return to the use of plastic straws and away from paper straws. “We’re going back to plastic straws. These things don’t work,” Trump said from the Oval Office. “I’ve had them many times, and on occasion, they break, they explode.”
